Package packfarm

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
packfarm.Farm
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
Farm class includes all necessary information in order to monitorize farm animals The class uses Singleton pattern, taking into account that the information relative to the monitorization must be centralized and unique.
Version:
1
Author:
Oihan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFarmAnimal​(FarmAnimal animal)
    Adds an animal to the farm animal set.
    void addSensor​(Sensor sensor)
    Adds a sensor to the sensor list.
    double calculateAnnualCost()
    Returns the sum of total annual cost of each animal.
    java.util.ArrayList<FarmAnimal> farmAnimalDeparture()
    Removes and returns every animal that is ready to leave the farm.
    int farmEcologicalAnimalAccount()
    Returns the number of animals that its production is ecological.
    static Farm getInstance()
    Returns the Farm class instance (following Singleton pattern).
    int howManyAnimals()
    Returns the amount of animals in the farm animal set.
    int howManySensor()
    Returns the amount of sensors in the sensor list (+1 because of the general sensor "ID00").
    FarmAnimal obtainFarmAnimal​(FarmAnimal animal)
    Returns from farm animal set the animal passed by parameter. (*) We are supposing that the animal passed by parameter is already registered in the farm
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> obtainFarmAnimalOlder​(int age)
    Given an age, returns an array with every animal that is older than the age passed by parameter.
    java.util.ArrayList<FarmAnimal> obtainPossiblySick()
    Returns an array of all the animals that could be sick.
    void register()
    Gets a physiological register from every farm animal.
    FarmAnimal removeFarmAnimal​(FarmAnimal animal)
    Removes from farm animal set the animal passed by parameter (*). (*) We are supposing that the animal passed by parameter is already registered in the farm
    void sortFarm()
    Sorts the farm animal set based on animal id.
    void whoIsInFarm()
    Prints all the information of every animal in the Farm.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Farm getInstance()
      Returns the Farm class instance (following Singleton pattern).
      Returns:
      the Farm class instance

    • addFarmAnimal

      public void addFarmAnimal​(FarmAnimal animal) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Adds an animal to the farm animal set.
      Parameters:
      animal - the farm animal to be added.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if no sensors are available (empty list) It is not mandatory to declare IndexOutOfBoundsException in the header because it is a runtime exception, so the compiler is aware that it can be raised

    • howManyAnimals

      public int howManyAnimals()
      Returns the amount of animals in the farm animal set.
      Returns:
      the amount of animals in the farm animal set

    • addSensor

      public void addSensor​(Sensor sensor)
      Adds a sensor to the sensor list.
      Parameters:
      sensor - the sensor to add

    • howManySensor

      public int howManySensor()
      Returns the amount of sensors in the sensor list (+1 because of the general sensor "ID00").
      Returns:
      the amount of sensors in the sensor list (+1 because of the general sensor "ID00")

    • register

      public void register()
      Gets a physiological register from every farm animal.

    • obtainPossiblySick

      public java.util.ArrayList<FarmAnimal> obtainPossiblySick()
      Returns an array of all the animals that could be sick.
      Returns:
      an array of all the animals that could be sick

    • obtainFarmAnimal

      public FarmAnimal obtainFarmAnimal​(FarmAnimal animal)
      Returns from farm animal set the animal passed by parameter. (*) We are supposing that the animal passed by parameter is already registered in the farm
      Parameters:
      animal - the farm animal to be retrieved from farm animal set
      Returns:
      the farm animal passed by parameter, from farm animal set the farm is passed by parameter

    • removeFarmAnimal

      public FarmAnimal removeFarmAnimal​(FarmAnimal animal)
      Removes from farm animal set the animal passed by parameter (*). (*) We are supposing that the animal passed by parameter is already registered in the farm
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal to be removed
      Returns:
      the animal that has been deleted the farm is passed by parameter

    • obtainFarmAnimalOlder

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> obtainFarmAnimalOlder​(int age)
      Given an age, returns an array with every animal that is older than the age passed by parameter.
      Parameters:
      age - animal age
      Returns:
      an array with every animal that is older than the age passed by parameter

    • farmAnimalDeparture

      public java.util.ArrayList<FarmAnimal> farmAnimalDeparture()
      Removes and returns every animal that is ready to leave the farm. Also, it retrieves the sensors from removed animals.
      Returns:
      an array with all the animals that left the farm

    • sortFarm

      public void sortFarm()
      Sorts the farm animal set based on animal id.

    • whoIsInFarm

      public void whoIsInFarm()
      Prints all the information of every animal in the Farm.
